name: Get Off the Farm
description:
Get ready to break out! You will play as a spark (or maybe a ghost) trying to escape a farm. By possessing machines,  you will try to escape an abandoned farm.

There are several ways to escape: 

- Get a vehicles out of the fence

- Get into the power lines

- Use a rocket to fly away

 - Controls - 

Press space to posses the glowing blue objects, and shift to exit them.

Controls will shift based on which machine you posses, so feel free to try them out. Machines will be controlled with arrows/WASD and the mouse button. Not all machines will have actions for both. 

By pressing R, you can restart.

This is a Unity game designed for a GameJam.
